website_summaries.verdict: An efficient, versatile 2-in-1 selfie stick for the budget-conscious buyer.
pros: Adjustable angles, rotatable phone holder, and removable Bluetooth remote
Compact design is portable and easy to store
cons: Tripod can become unsteady when fully extended
Not quite as long as some models

website_summaries.verdict: Great for selfie stick beginners who want to expand their media skills.
pros: Tripod is built with anti-skid pads, providing piece of mind of mind as well as consistent footage
Lightweight yet one of the stronger options, built of aluminum alloy
Quick to set up and put to use
cons: Doesn't reach as high as other tripods

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this selfie stick if you looking for one.
customer_reviews.text: I love this concept putting a selfie and tripod into one stick. I use tripod all the time but ocaasionally like taking pic with my boy and this one works perfectly. The rod is made very strong unlike other typical ones that are very flimsy and easily bend. Each tripod leg has a rubber grip so keeps the stand in place. Also I able to use my battery pack case and still attach the phone to the selfie stick. It does come with a Bluetooth shutter button makes it even more convenient and it slides nicely on to the stick. If you like selfies this is definately the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Shark BaitTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Tripod is not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice design and good selfie stick with bluetooth. Stick is light and short so it's easy to carry around. I tested the Bluetooth out, and it is connected and working fine; however, if you purchase this for tripod than it's not working really well. I bought this because I need to film some cooking videos using the tripod. But it's not working out, legs are not sturdy. There are no lock or unlock button to hold the legs together, so my iphone 7s Plus is falling/flipping down when I have it in 180 degree.
customer_reviews.author: Last_Avenger

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: I have several selfie sticks. Pros: compact size, easy to use remote, attached tripod, doesn't use batteries for the remote (I, however, prefer batteries which can be changed when charging power isn't always available) Cons: the part that holds the phone is not tight, and the camera is tilted when attached. It is easy to compensate when holding the stick, but when using the tripod, the picture will not be straight, have to charge remote using a plug (not always convenient), short stick length I also bought this for my adult daughter who likes it. I like it, but I don't love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R

customer_reviews.title: Although the concept is great and it assisted me on taking nice pics during ...
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose and for the most part it worked and did what I needed it for. It’s not heavy so with the weight of the phone it keeps falling down. The rubber little pieces that it has to hold the phone, keep coming off, so surely I lost one of the rubber parts and now the phone slips all the time. Is very cheaply made. Although the concept is great and it assisted me on taking nice pics during our vacation, I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Fontana

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Say to set up, easy to use. Sync’s up to phone easy. Tripod is only good when retracted. The only thing Is it’s short when extended. But overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mastenbrook Sr

customer_reviews.title: Consider this selfie stick to be good product
customer_reviews.text: Selfie stick is appropriate for taking photos where the people's faces and a bit of the surrounding background are in the frame. The tripod feature supports the phone well enough when the stick is fully extended and when the tripod is on a firm surface. The length of the stick makes it appropriate for holding the phone at the proper height when sitting on the ground. Had no trouble pairing the remote control to the phone through Blue Tooth. Have not fully tested the life of the battery yet however was able to use the remote for ten minutes without problems. The phone holder is like a spring-loaded clamp. Maximum opening available to hold phone horizontally is 3 inches.
customer_reviews.author: frkw

customer_reviews.title: ehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: Useful. But better options out there for the price as well. Not sturdy when put into tripod mode, tips over easily because not enough weight to support at bottom. Have not tired remote so cannot comment on its functionality or usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: ...no name...

customer_reviews.title: i'm using the excellent phone holder attachment of this stick/tripod (this attachment is ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. I was actually looking for a 40-inch long stick when I bought this one. So, i'm using the excellent phone holder attachment of this stick/tripod (this attachment is also rotating 90 degrees!) to replace the inferior attachment on my existing but long stick. If this manufacturer makes a 40-inch stick of the same design, i'll definitely be tempted to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: JeffS

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product very much, it is small and light weight hence can fit easily in a purse or a back pocket. since the product is small it doesn't extend too long but will do the trick. 4 stars because I didn't like the tripod, it will work only only very even surface and will take sometime and effort to balance it which might be tough when you trying to tripod it at a touristy spot!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely worth getting!! My phone almost got cracked (thanks to a glass screen protector) when I was using it as a tripod and it fell, but most of the selfie sticks don't even work as tripods and you don't wanna carry heavy tripods around anyways. So it works great if you make sure it's stable. You might want to leave your bag or something in front of it so that it could catch the phone in case it falls too. I'm so happy with the product and I couldn't have taken such great pictures without this!!! You just have to make sure you don't over use it until or partner gets sick of taking pictures! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Shippok

customer_reviews.title: A nice selfie stick with some drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is a stick that is compact, and grips the phone without any problems. The remote included is seamless. Came with acharging cable and a complimentary key chain. I love the tripod feature of this product! My only problem with this product is that the stick does not stay extended when the phone weight is on the stick. They might want to add a locking mechanism and or a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Joints are loose. Too much play in the joints. Might return.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Loose at the handle and phone mount. Lightweight and portable- but joints could have been better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris E

customer_reviews.title: Remote does not function properly!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the concept of having the remote so when I'm taking pictures of my son and I, they don't look like a selfie. The remote won't take a picture though, it will only make the camera zoom in. I've tried everything to figure it out but nothing worked. The whole reason I bought this was for the all in one stand with remote. Just another piece of garbage now.
customer_reviews.author: Dollskin16

customer_reviews.title: Super easy
customer_reviews.text: This is great as a tripod & selfie stick! The remote charges super fast & holds charge for a long time. The bluetooth connection is almost immediate & doesn't require complicated setup/instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING AMAZON PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: OH GOODNESS I LOVE THIS SELFIE STICK. finally i can take family photos amd actually be in the photo. The remote is a great touch very small so i would recommend putting the remote back in its spot when done. Easy to connect to device. Great gift or something for yourself, and those selfies we like to take, have never looked better
customer_reviews.author: Bonniiee

customer_reviews.title: Battery died frequently then stopped working after two days of use.
customer_reviews.text: This did not hold a charge for very long , usually after two photos being taken the battery would go dead,, then it completely stopped syncing with my phone, so I had to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect selfie stick.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this selfie stick on vacation recently and it did very well. I used the tripod feature and the remote and it was great. It’s durable, reliable and very easy to use. When you turn it on it connects to the Bluetooth very quickly. I bought a second one for my girlfriend. I read the reviews and this one was one of the better choices. I’m very glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: meredithm121

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I did a bit of research on these tripod/selfie stick and this met all of my needs. Compact, lightweight, remote (rechargeable) shutter. The remote paired with my phone on the first try. Very impressed! I would recommend this to anyone who wants a small, lightweight tripod to use on vacation, or on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Bre606

customer_reviews.title: Worthless....
customer_reviews.text: Used this about 6 times and went to use it today and it doesn’t work. It appears the remote is dead and I’ve had it charging for hours now. Disappointed in this and wish I wouldn’t have ordered it, should last longer than this. Wish I could get it replaced but the return deadl8ne has passed.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: but the product application overall is good.
customer_reviews.text: Discharges battery very fast, but the product application overall is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pics. Easy to use. Remote doesnt take video
customer_reviews.text: Overall I liked this product. I pove having the remote to snap pics. However you cannot use it to do video, which was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Answer to my selfie prayers! Built in tripod easy!
customer_reviews.text: Durable, Strudy and easy as ever to use! I cant believe I've gone these many years without this product. I had a selfie stick before but it was flimsy. This one is STURDY and PRACTICAL! Amen!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well made!
customer_reviews.text: The first selfie stick I have bought and it is great! I like the tripod feature and the size and simplicity. The Bluetooth remote works great. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Good little stand but base a little shaky!
customer_reviews.text: This held up my Samsung phone but it was a little shaky and I was concerned that it would tilt over I still had to work with it a little bit and see if I can get the stand to stabilize a little bit more but it did the trick when I was recording a video so pretty good!

customer_reviews.title: Great design but grab the warranty
customer_reviews.text: Everything is nicely made especially the pivot head on top has detents as you pan the head. The only concern I have is the tripod legs seem hollow but for the price and compactness it’s an awesome design. Grab the few dollar warranty and be set for 2 years

customer_reviews.title: I like the Bluetooth button to take pictures but unfortunately i ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the Bluetooth button to take pictures but unfortunately i didn't like the wire charger, nor did i like the PC tripod (the bottom 3legs). when i use the stand, it just wouldn't stay still and the tripod is made of cheap material.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I ordered this sooner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way!

I love the fact that everything is in one piece and it folds up neatly to fit in my purse! I love the remote that is attached, but easily removable when using the tripod. Best selfie stick ever! I ordered it yesterday and it was delivered today! Amazing service!

Cons: it stopped working after the 4th day of my vacation and the tri-pod is not very stable. 😏I’m very disappointed bc it’s a good item but it didn’t last for no reason

customer_reviews.title: Very nice selfie stick with many more options
customer_reviews.text: Very nice selfie stick with many more options. Great for a family on the go that normally is terrible at taking pictures!

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy and holds my iPhone 6 Plus perfectly. I love that it has a tripod and a removable remote.

customer_reviews.text: Portable, flexible, nice removable camera trigger. Works with still and video camera. Only downside. the tripod stand is flimsy and not very sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Wow this product is really nice and doesnt look cheap.i like how the remote has a slot making it blends in with the stick nice👍

customer_reviews.title: The seller is very so responsive and stick is really good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stick because we are bored with selfies and want to take our pictures with the environment without our arms:) It is very easy to use, and so stable even on the sand. Sadly, our remote had not worked after using twice so I wrote to the seller. He replied to my message immediately and sent me a new remote. And it is perfect now!
customer_reviews.author: uzalaite

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Insane quality for the price. I love all the attention to detail. This stick is easy to operate and adjust and feels great in the hand. The one feature I’d love to have is the ability to use the remote to start and stop the recording of video. As it is, the button operates the shutter for the camera only. In video mode, pressing the button increases the volume. No where near a dealbreaker at this price, but is worth knowing ahead of time.

product_meta.title: Apexel 2-in-1 Extendable Selfie Stick Monopod Tripod Stand with Wireless Remote Shutter for iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS/XS Max/XR/X/8/8+, Galaxy Note 10/10+/S10/S10+, OnePlus, Huawei and More
product_meta.description:
【Why Need a Selfie Stick?】 

 Wanna Record your memories of life? Wanna stay every wonderful monment forever? 

 【Why Need a selfie stick tripod? 】 

 Gone are the days of having to ask a stranger to take photos for you. With it, you can take photos with family and friends at any time. 

 【Why choose us-Apexel?】 

 *Design 

 One-piece design, embeded removable bluetooth remote, 3 ways to Rotate, rechargeble battery. One-button to take photos in best angle. 

 *Stable 

 4 slot on body to fix it, space aluminum alloy, anti-slip handle & tripod. Good bearing capacity. 

 *Convenient
